properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 1:38PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
At 136 pm...Areas of marine fog...some locally dense...have
developed across coastal sections of Cameron County. Visibilities
are being reduced to around 1 mile in general, with locally
denser fog reducing visibilities to one half of a mile at times.
These areas of fog will likely persist along the Cameron County
coastline throughout the afternoon hours.

Motorists, especially those traveling on the Causeway to and from
South Padre Island, are advised to drive with caution this
afternoon as visibilities may change rapidly over short distances.

Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your
vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant
reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to
destinations.

NWSheadline: Patchy Areas of Dense Fog plaguing the Cameron County coastline
